sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"特别地"之意。
means: specially ： 着重为做某事而"专门地、特意地"，相当于on purpose。
especially ： 较多地用于正式文体，侧重超过其它全部，突出到"特别地"的程度，相当于in particular。
particularly ： 用来指同类中特别突出的一个。

sentence.Network_en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentence.Network_en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

sentence.Network_en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentence.Network_cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... eraser n. 橡皮擦；黑板擦 especially ad. 特别，尤其 Europe* n. 欧洲.
草莓网超低折扣女士香水 - 包邮香港草莓网 ... 埃德·哈迪 Ed Hardy 特别 Especially 天生野性哈代 Ed Hardy Born Wild.
高考英语高频短语 - 豆丁网 ... (＝begin) 起源于，由……引起 (＝especially) 特别是，尤其 (＝peacefully) 安静，平安.
2012高考英语大纲词汇全表 - 豆丁网 ... envy n. 妒忌 especially 尤其是 99. event 事件 102.

list.abs: To surrender possession of , especially by treaty ., 割让割让 , 尤指通过条约的割让.
西班牙语专业词汇---经贸类... ... Agencia depositaria 存款分理处 Agencia especial 特约代理 Agencia exclusiva 独家代理行.
used especially of mail ; paid in advance ., 尤其用于邮政 ; 提前支付的.
I love deadliness . I especially like the whooshing sound they as they goby ., 我喜欢最后期限 . 我尤其喜欢他们飞驰而过时发出的嗖嗖声.
Yes , it was wonderful . I especially remember the mountains and lakes ., 是的 , 那儿的景色很棒 . 我特别记得那儿的山脉和湖泊.

entry.def: You use especially to emphasize that what you are saying applies more to one person, thing, or area than to any others.

example.ex: Millions of wild flowers colour the valleys, especially in April and May...
example.tran: 尤其是在四五月份，不计其数的野花盛开，山谷里一片绚烂色彩。

example.ex: Re-apply sunscreen every two hours, especially if you have been swimming.
example.tran: 每两个小时重新涂一次防晒油，尤其是在游泳的时候。

entry.def: You use especially to emphasize a characteristic or quality.

example.ex: Babies lose heat much faster than adults, and are especially vulnerable to the cold in their first month.
example.tran: 婴儿散热比成年人快得多，在出生后的头一个月特别容易感冒。

means.word_mean: 1. to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common;

sentences.sentence: "an especially (or specially) cautious approach to the danger"

auth_sentence.content: I'll miss everyone there, especially the gaffer.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'll miss everyone there, especially the gaffer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'll miss everyone there, especially the gaffer.

auth_sentence.content: Especially when you consider the level of money involved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Especially when you consider the level of money involved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Especially when you consider the level of money involved.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

Sentence.sentence: It was terrible at first, especially getting up before dawn to catch that 6:30 train.
Tax breaks bring the cost down, especially in California, but in many states ZEHs can be prohibitively expensive
They're also expensive, especially when you factor in the average college student's limited budget, typically costing hundreds of dollars every semester.

A man who had recently reconciled with his brother told Gold there's something that lets older people to put aside bad deeds of the past and focus a little on what we need now, especially when it's sisters and brothers.
Social learning theories also don't explain why reinforcement and modeling work for some children but not others, especially those in the same family and even identical twins.
Most pop singers suffer from three things: lack of training, overuse and abuse of the voice, especially when they are young.

sentences.cn: 这尤其引起了他们的好奇心。

sentences.en: Especially is Dennie good at swimming.

jushi.english: We eat all kinds of food, especially rice and fish.
jushi.chinese: 我们吃各种食物,尤其是米饭和鱼。

jushi.english: We stand against all forms of cruelty, especially to children.
jushi.chinese: 我们反对任何形式的虐待,尤其是虐待儿童。

jushi.english: Noise is unpleasant, especially when you're trying to sleep.
jushi.chinese: 噪音真讨厌,尤其是当你要入睡的时候。
